statements: DELETE FROM content_assets WHERE asset_title = 'Example Title';
DELETE FROM content_assets WHERE asset_title = 'Example Content';
DELETE FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1 AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM assets WHERE article_id IN (SELECT article_id FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith');

DELETE FROM article_videos WHERE video_id = 3 AND article_id = 4;
